description:
Younger sister to Daba Myroad, the two became separated years ago and she appears as a member of the Poseidal military on the merchant ship Epsilon, which is secretly part of the Yaman Extermination Plan. Olibee is later promoted to Poseidal`s imperial guard, but as Poseidal`s "bio-sensor" suffers from mind control. She is always accompanied by Elite 13 member Rockley Ron.
Olibee is kidnapped by Giwaza Lowau, who rebelled against Poseidal in part due to Olibee`s promotion. Daba and Gavlet, who fell in love with her try multiple times to rescue her, eventually succeeding. Olibee assists with finding Poseidal (Mian) during the final battle in Sveto. When the war comes to an end, Olibee is no longer under Poseidal`s control but has suffered brain damage, so Daba abandons his other friends to take care of her.
name: Quwasan Olibee
